mapper.select: select * from applydealeraccount as a INNER JOIN members as m ON a.member_id = m.member_id where a.member_id=#{member_id}
select * from orders as o INNER JOIN products as p ON o.product_idx = p.product_idx INNER JOIN members as m ON m.member_id = o.member_id where o.order_num =#{order_num} and m.member_id = #{member_id}
select * from orders as o INNER JOIN products as p ON o.product_idx = p.product_idx where o.member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.update: update orders set status='주문 취소' where order_num=#{order_num}
mapper.select: select p.product_name, sum(order_pcs) as cnt, p.member_id, p.product_idx, r.view_count, p.thumbnail_img, p.end_date, p.original_price, p.discount_price from orders as o RIGHT OUTER JOIN products as p ON p.product_idx = o.product_idx LEFT OUTER JOIN reviewproducts as r ON p.product_idx = r.product_idx where p.member_id = #{member_id} group by o.product_idx
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (product_idx, member_id, order_pcs, total_price, order_date,deli_name,deli_phone, deli_zipcode, deli_addr, deli_detailaddr, deli_memo, pay_type, status) VALUES (4, 'user01', 3, #{total_price}, now(), #{deli_name}, #{deli_phone}, #{deli_zipcode}, #{deli_addr}, #{deli_detailaddr}, #{deli_memo}, #{pay_type}, '주문 완료');
